title: The Machine Gun Murders: Episode 113
itunes:subtitle: Forest Gate, London, 2003\.   One normal August afternoon on a suburban street people were busy going about their every day life.  Then, after a minor traffic violation, three men decided they wanted to exact a terrible revenge completely out of propor...
content:encoded:
Forest Gate, London, 2003.   One normal August afternoon on a suburban street people were busy going about their every day life.  Then, after a minor traffic violation, three men decided they wanted to exact a terrible revenge completely out of proportion with the incident.

This week in the UK True Crime weekly podcast I look at just what happened on that summers afternoon and how it destroyed so many lives.
